title: Evaluating functions
text: Given the equation for a function, we should replace the input variable in the equation with the value provided and then calculate the result.

title: Replacement
text: Replace the variable $$x$$ with a + $$h$$, and we get $$f{\left(a+h\right)}=\frac{6\left(a+h\right)-1}{5\left(a+h\right)+2}$$.

title: Simplification
text: Simplify the expression $$\frac{6\left(a+h\right)-1}{5\left(a+h\right)+2}$$. What do you get?
